Add content mode toggle: deep connections vs definition sheet

- Toggle button in header \(left of dark/light switch\)
- Default: deep connections mode — concise context-flow blocks linking
  concepts with logical arrows, key insights, and cross-chapter references
- Toggle: definition sheet mode — hides all context-flow blocks, showing
  only formal definitions/theorems/proofs for quick exam review
- ~230 context-flow blocks added across all 25 chapters
- State persisted in localStorage

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
